abstract: New Jersey Transit proposes raising fares by 9 percent and cutting several rail and bus service routes in effort to close large budget gap; agency's board of directors will vote on plan at July 8 meeting.
lead_paragraph: Fares for most riders would increase about 9 percent in an effort to close a large budget gap. Several rail and bus routes would also be reduced.

headline.main: N.J. Transit Proposes Fare Increase and Service Cuts
headline.print_headline: N.J. Transit Proposes Raising Fares by 9%

snippet: Fares for most riders would increase about 9 percent in an effort to close a large budget gap. Several rail and bus routes would also be reduced.
